summary: New Player House And Hideout in RiverWood. Enjoy.
descriptionHtml:
New Player's House And Hideout in RiverWood Maked By Gabriel Tarzia. Enjoy.

Please, Are In Alpha, Report Me Bugs And New Ideas. Thank You Very Much.

_______________________________________________________________________

##UPDATES VERSION 0.2##

*Improved Hideout*

*Improved Alchemy & Enchantment Room*

*Improved Forge Room*

*More Mannequins Added To Forge Room*

*Better Ilumination*

*Added Mannequins For Alchemy & Enchantment Set*

*Fixed Imperfections*

*Dagger Displays In Main Room Now Are Functional*

*Weapons Racks Added To Forge Room*
_______________________________________________________________________

##UPDATES##

*Finished The Main House*

*Finished The Main Hideout(Daggers Displays are not 100% functional)*
________________________________________________________________________

##UPDATES IN PROGRESS##

*Added More Mannequins And Support For Weapons*

*Added More Decoration Details, Example: Mini Barrels For Ingredients, Carpets*

*Added Functional Display For Daggers*

_________________________________________________________________________

Thanks to Shawn, Developer Of The Mod, Dovahkin Hideout, which encouraged Me The Produce My Own Version Of A Hideout.
author: Gabriel Tarzia
